## Data Processing & Exploratory Analysis

```{r Get Packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# load packages
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)


```


```{r Load Data, cache=TRUE}
# load compressed data as tibble
noaa <- read_csv("noaa_extreme_weather.csv.bz2")
```


```{r Clean Data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
## clean `EVTYPE` data
# format all levels to uppercase (reduces levels by almost 100)
noaa[, "EVTYPE"] <- toupper(noaa$EVTYPE)

# correct mispellings

# simplify categories
blizzard <- sapply(as.character(noaa$EVTYPE), 
                   function(x){grepl("^.*BLIZZARD.*$", x)})
noaa[blizzard, "EVTYPE"] <- "BLIZZARD"

hail <- sapply(as.character(noaa$EVTYPE), 
                   function(x){grepl("^.*HAIL.*$", x)})
noaa[hail, "EVTYPE"] <- "HAIL"

# changes to feature classes
noaa[, "EVTYPE"] <- as.factor(noaa$EVTYPE)
```
